channel.title: Play The Game
channel.description: Give tips or organize games, matches, instructional sessions, or any other in-game meetings here!

item.title: N00bish UT2K4 Question
item.author: invalid@example.com (KurtonTheMagician)
item.dc:creator: KurtonTheMagician
item.content:encoded:
How do I use the music player? (F11) I've browsed for music files, but all it turns up is the .root file, even in the app's Music folder. This kinda saddens me, since, whilst fragging, I enjoy listening to Frank Zappa's "Peaches en Regalia".

EDITZ: This is the Mac version.

item.title: Would you like to play the UT2k4 team gamemodes with good players?
item.author: invalid@example.com (scirmast)
item.dc:creator: scirmast
item.content:encoded:
UT2k4 is not dead at all, and it will never die unless we let it to! UT2004.Rebirth is a set of pickup channel and ladders for the UT2k4 team gamemodes. We play different gamemodes every day and the current pickup schedule is as follows:

Mon: Assault
Tue: NW Bombing Run
Wed: Classic Domination
Thu: Double Domination
Fri: NW Capture the Flag
Sat: Free choice
Sun: iCTF4

Website can be found at http://motig.clanservers.com/
And the pickup channel is located in the...

Would you like to play the UT2k4 team gamemodes with good players?

item.title: Changing overtime rules in UT.
item.author: invalid@example.com (The Purple Bunny)
item.dc:creator: The Purple Bunny
item.content:encoded: Sudden death overtime p!sses me off in 2K4, especially in deathmatch / team deathmatch where I had sent a match into overtime at the last second, then instantly got killed and lost. Yet I can't find anything in the game or any files to change it to a timed overtime. Any mutators or junk like that I need?

item.title: New game, FREE, DM
item.author: invalid@example.com (ReD_Fist)
item.dc:creator: ReD_Fist
item.content:encoded:
http://www.nexuiz.com/

170meg download

Go try it out, give the guys who did it some credit by making it a tad more popular.

They do have a "donate" thing but it is free, if I had enough bucks I probaby would donate a little.

You would all have to play it to see what you think, but my biggest complaint is head bob and a small thin red crosshair.
And a heads up, to disconnect from a server you need to type in "disconnect" in the console.

UPDATE
there IS bots AND you...

New game, FREE, DM

item.content:encoded: Can someone make a zip file of the best dm maps on Nalicity. I dont want to go through every map in the database coz itll take a few days!

item.title: New FoT-Mappack
item.author: invalid@example.com (milb)
item.dc:creator: milb
item.content:encoded:
May you already noticed that we're doing a new mappack! It's called "Frags of Time" and is a DM-Mappack. It will have to parts each one includes six maps.
More Infos can be found at: http://timewarp.mib-maps.net (the site isn't finished!!!)

item.title: How do you run a server?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Eyuva 'S' NRG)
item.dc:creator: Eyuva 'S' NRG
item.content:encoded:
Ok, I want to run a listen server so me and my brother and a few friends from my town can play. A listen server allows me to play while I host, so I need that ability.

I would like it if random people could join as well.

Thanks for any help. How do I do this?

item.title: Search a certain map
item.author: invalid@example.com (Creavion)
item.dc:creator: Creavion
item.content:encoded:
First of all I know the (advanced) searching function to find a map, but I don`t know the mapname or the author name anymore.
The map is for UT Classic, Assault the gametyp. The player starts in a village (with a harbor, frozen water) and must assault a house on the top of a snow mountain. During the attack the player must find some villager and the end he must kill the "boss" in a house. Can anyone say me the map name? I don`t have any idea...

item.title: CHAOS UT2004...COMMENTS, QUESTIONS.
item.author: invalid@example.com (ReD_Fist)
item.dc:creator: ReD_Fist
item.content:encoded:
There is probably a thread someware allready.

I only tried 2 dm maps so I don't have an informed opinion on things.

But I was wondering about somthing with that ripper,I tried the ripper ver1 or somthing for ut2004 in my map i am doing,and chaos does the same dang thing,even though it is all different.

Why is it those damn things stick around (the discs) stuck in walls after they stop bouncing around.
Is that made that way or is ut2004 so fouled up against a ripper it cant be...

CHAOS UT2004...COMMENTS, QUESTIONS.

item.title: I need help
item.author: invalid@example.com (Vanillaice378)
item.dc:creator: Vanillaice378
item.content:encoded: How do I go to the other side to goto the cups after jumping over the letters iehova? The level I am talking about is called AS-IndianaJones3 for Unreal Tournament.

item.title: looking for some stuff...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Couchman)
item.dc:creator: Couchman
item.content:encoded: can anybody give me a link for the rocketx..fighterx or whatever mod for UT99...and i was wondering where i can get the race maps for strangelove and that..its assault and you do a race twords the end by flying on the rockets..nalicity doesnt have them

item.title: Just ask the Rukee!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Rukee)
item.dc:creator: Rukee
item.content:encoded:
If you need help finding a file for UT.....I can usually help! You need a certin UT .utx file?? or a Bonus Pack 4 and don`t know were to find it?? Or mabee your looking for the SF mod and can`t find it....I`m the guy to ask!!
I`m no expert, but I sure like to help out UT players trying to get game!!! And I have a verry large UT file archive.
Just ask the Rukee!!!

item.title: UT hosted 5vs5 iCTF zp cup!
item.author: invalid@example.com (DevilYoua)
item.dc:creator: DevilYoua
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

I'm a Supervisor of a big cup. This cup will start in 1 month, but we want something special.

Our maplist in UT is always so boring, we want something news. New maplist with new maps! Of course there will be some standart maps, but there also will be a poll with the new maps. The maps with the most votes will be in the cup .

Because I think there are some people in here who want to try to make their map 'famous'. I post it here. If you want further information mail to...

UT hosted 5vs5 iCTF zp cup!

item.title: Weird Maps That Don't Appear on NC3
item.author: invalid@example.com (GTD-Carthage)
item.dc:creator: GTD-Carthage
item.content:encoded:
Unreal Tournament is basically more on the online genre than single player. Everytime you go battle online, you go to some server that usually requires the content to be downloaded. I went to some Monster Hunt server yesterday (forgot the name) to see some map called "MH-Sushi" where you have to jump over floating masses of Japanese food. The whole place was basically one big room with a rather weird looking texture. We were all (all 10 of us) enjoying the server's maps until someone voted...

Weird Maps That Don't Appear on NC3

item.title: Most well-rounded weapons?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Nimbostratus)
item.dc:creator: Nimbostratus
item.content:encoded:
I know that some weapons are better than others in certain situations (like the ripper in tight hallways, sniper rifle for long distance), but I'm not sure what would be decent in the most situations.

So, in your opinion, what is the most well-rounded weapon for UT99 or UT2003?

item.title: The AHK Gang Challenge ...
item.author: invalid@example.com (hotbeef)
item.dc:creator: hotbeef
item.content:encoded:
The AHK Gang formally welcomes you to join us for some good old fashioned Deathmatch play. If you know what we're talking about, you KNOW what we're talking about. No team play, not capture the flag, just kill or be killed Deathmatch!

We're not a clan, we're a gang. We'd just as soon put a rocket in each other's rump as light you up with a chain gun. Yeah, that's what we're talking about. Nobody's safe when the AHK gang is in town, not even the guy who just wants to hide in the corner...

The AHK Gang Challenge ...
